app_descript:
App Name: Caviar - Order Food Delivery

Brief

Dine in with the exquisite flavors from the city's finest eateries with Caviar, an app that brings a distinguished dining experience right to your doorstep. Indulge in a personalized foodie adventure, choosing from handpicked local delights to Michelin-starred treasures. With the convenience of real-time tracking and no-contact delivery, turn any ordinary evening into a celebratory feast with Caviar.

Core Features üìå

  • Curated Restaurant Selection: Access a selection of exclusive local and high-end restaurants, including options you won't find on other delivery services.
  • Exclusive Deals: Enjoy regular deals and special discounts, also available for DoorDash DashPass members on Caviar.
  • Convenient Delivery Options: Opt for no-contact delivery or the traditional hand-it-to-me service according to your preference.
  • Live Order Tracking: Monitor your meal‚Äôs journey from kitchen to doorstep with real-time updates.
  • Flexible Scheduling: Plan ahead with the ability to schedule deliveries or pickups in advance, all with no minimum order constraints.

Pros üëç

  • First Delivery Perk: Benefit from a free first delivery and grab $10 off your initial order.
  • High-Quality Dining: Revel in top-tier meals ranging from local favorites to gastronomic revelations recommended by The Infatuation.
  • No Order Minimums: Freedom to order as much or as little as you desire, without any mandatory minimum spend.
  • DashPass Integration: DashPass members can cross-use their benefits on Caviar, maximizing their subscription perks.

Cons üëé

  • Limited Availability: Caviar's service may be restricted to certain areas, limiting its accessibility for some users.
  • Premium Pricing: Exclusive restaurant options may come with a higher price tag compared to other delivery apps.
  • Applicability of Special Deals: Deals and specials might be subject to specific conditions or limited-time periods.

Price üíµ

Caviar is a free app offering both deliveries and pickups with various pricing structures depending on restaurant selection and order size. Remember to apply your code 'TENONFOOD' on first orders over $35 to enjoy savings.

Please note discount codes and the pricing model are subject to change as per the company's discretion.

Crafted with user experience and appetite in mind, Caviar stands out as a premium food delivery service for those who savor quality and convenience. Whether you're setting the scene for a romantic dinner or treating yourself to a gourmet solo feast, Caviar caters to every culinary desire with sophistication and style.
